Powassan Virus Disease (Tests for Powassan Virus Nucleic Acid)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    34456-4 Powassan virus RNA [Presence] in Blood by NAA with probe detection
    34457-2 Powassan virus RNA [Presence] in Cerebral spinal fluid by NAA with probe detection
    55144-0 Powassan virus RNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
